snippet: Sylvie Guillem is back in New York with the program “6000 miles away,” presented by the Joyce Theater Foundation.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews dance show entitled 6000 miles away, featuring performance by ballerina Sylvie Guillem, at the David H Koch Theater.
lead_paragraph: Sylvie Guillem is back in New York with the program “6000 miles away,” presented by the Joyce Theater Foundation.

headline.seo: Sylvie Guillem in ‘6000 Miles Away’ at David H. Koch Theater
headline.main: Body as Instrument to Retool Classical Idiom
headline.print_headline: Body as Instrument To Retool Classical Idiom
